channel.title: An Uploading Question
channel.description: So Im Uploading My Client To MegaUpload, And When i Download It And Try To Log In It says Error Connecting To Server, But When I Logg in From My Main Files It Runs Fine, I Edited With a source and a client so do i upload them both? Im trying to make it so everyone can play. Usually I Have To Run The Source And Client But People Tell Me To Just Upload My Client To Web. Help Please If This Made Sense.

item.title: An Uploading Question
item.dc:creator: @ClawedScape ClawedScape
item.description:
@ClawedScape wrote:

So Im Uploading My Client To MegaUpload, And When i Download It And Try To Log In It says Error Connecting To Server, But When I Logg in From My Main Files It Runs Fine, I Edited With a source and a client so do i upload them both? Im trying to make it so everyone can play. Usually I Have To Run The Source And Client But People Tell Me To Just Upload My Client To Web. Help Please If This Made Sense.

Read full topic
